title: innamum manam
sahitya:
innamum manam iLagavillaiyO ennai AluDaiya annai appanE


anupallavi

  munnisaitt-unnai mUlAdi munivar mutti peTradellAm pittar kAdaiyO


caraNam    kaTra viddai unnaik-kANap-pOghumO kanauv sOru pashikkuNavum AghumO
paTrillAda unnap-paTri vAzhavE pashu pAsham tIrap-pati jnAnam tara
